attributes.action: Make all companies pay an overtime rate for all extra hours worked over your contracted hours. Including any extra hours worked at the end or begining of your shift.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment. There are no laws saying a company has to pay an overtime rate. I want laws introduced to boost peoples working rights. I want time & a half for Mon to Fri & Double time for Sat to Sun.
